I am Elvis The

I specialise in graphic design, UI/UX, Software Engineering and Photography

View my work

I specialise in

Photography as well as creating digital masterpieces and UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile and website applications

Concepting

My initial photographic concept focuses on defining the visual identity of the client or company. From that I create a moodboard that acts as a guide with a selection of photos, strong compositions , compelling lighting and unique perspectives

UI/UX

User research revealed a need for a streamlined submission process and an engaging voting system. Wireframes helped define information architecture , ensuring easy navigation and intuitive interaction.

Visual Design

From apps to websites visual identity is needed to reflect the vibrancy of urban life while maintaining a clean and modern feel. I explore several logo concepts , color palettes and inspiration from my fellow designers to achieve a final concept

Interaction

I create a visual timeline that shows progression of your work, highlighting key milestones and decisions.

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off a practices formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

I start by identifiying the overall goal of the project and its lifetime. From that I conduct research on the target audience who will interact with the project with ease and key features that will give productive success metrics.

2

Brainstorming & Concept

I use brainstorming sessions , mind mapping , and competitive analysis to generate ideas. with this i create concept sketches, moodboards and finalise with a chosen concept.

3

UI/UX planning

I illustrate userflows for key tasks, such as creating profiles searching etc, these diagrams show the steps involved and the different screens the user will interact with. Next i continue to wireframs to outline the layout and functionality of key screens. Finally I present high-fidelity mockups showing the visual design of the app.

4

Interaction

Finally i showcase a clikable prototype demonstrating the user flow and key interactions. This allows viewers to experience the app/design's functionality firsthand.
